title: Add intro audio player under hero portrait on homepage

requirements.summary: Insert an intro audio player inside the existing Hero section, directly below the portrait and directly above the brand/PRESENTS headings, without disrupting existing Hero content.
acceptanceCriteria: On the homepage, an audio player is visible in the Hero area directly below the portrait and above the “Simply Shane Designs (c)sm” / “-- PRESENTS --” text.
The audio player can play/pause the uploaded intro audio and shows standard controls (at minimum: play/pause and seek).
The new audio player does not break or remove the existing Hero content, including the portrait, headings, subtitle, and the “Site Soundtrack” section.

file_operations.description: Add a native HTML audio player (with controls enabled) within the Hero content block, positioned after the portrait image block and before the brand/PRESENTS headings; ensure layout spacing matches the existing design and that the rest of the Hero (subtitle, description, buttons, and “Site Soundtrack” section) remains intact.

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded intro audio file as a frontend static asset and wire the Hero audio player to reference that exact filename.
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded audio file exists in the frontend static assets (served under the /assets/ path) and is referenced by the Hero audio player.
No other audio/video files are added as placeholders.
A fresh load of the site can play the intro audio without requiring authentication or membership.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded intro audio file to frontend static assets using the original uploaded filename exactly (replace this file path with the real uploaded filename and extension before committing).

Wire the Hero audio player src to the static asset at frontend/public/assets/INTRO_AUDIO_UPLOADED_FILENAME.ext (served under the /assets/ path) and ensure no authentication/membership checks gate playback.
